markdownRemark.html: Situated in Mijas Costa, perfect for people living in Mijas, Fuengirola, Coin and Alhaurin el Grande. Ages 3-18, co-ed day school; an officially recognised bilingual school offering an English curriculum with GCSEs at 16 and a wide range of A Levels at 18.
